name: dom99
description: Extend html with directives to manipulate the dom with JavaScript

scripts.minify: terser built/dom99Script.es5.js --ie8 --compress drop_console,properties,dead_code,join_vars --mangle -o built/dom99Script.es5.min.js && terser built/dom99ES.js --type module --ie8 --compress drop_console,properties,dead_code,join_vars --mangle -o built/dom99ES.min.js
scripts.build: npm run roll && npm run transpile && npm run minify
scripts.transpilePolyfills: babel polyfills/remove.js > polyfills/built/remove.js && babel polyfills/dom-hidden.js > polyfills/built/dom-hidden.js
scripts.examples: npm run bundleExamples && npm run transpileExamples && npm run demoDependencies
scripts.buildAll: npm run build && npm run transpilePolyfills && npm run examples && npm run doc && npm run bhtml && npm run yesno
scripts.d: npm run build && npm run bhtml
